details.Singularity: Used to run the Camera Trap Classifier container.
details.Python 3: Used to run the Camera Trap Classifier code.
details.Camera Trap Classifier: Used to predict whether images contain animals or not.
details.CPU: Required to run the prediction model.
details.Storage: Required for storing the input data, model files, and output predictions.
details.Network: Required to download the container and code.
